H0.text: Of which African country is Niamey the capital. Mali

H1.text: Of which African country is Niamey the capital. Burkina Faso

H2.text: Of which African country is Niamey the capital. Benin

H3.text: Of which African country is Niamey the capital. Niger

A4.text: Niamey is the capital and largest city of Niger.
